about.description: Calculate the 2nd order force constants using phonopy and LAMMPS.
about.summary: LAMMPS interface for phonon calculations using phonopy

name: phonolammps
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "phonolammps" %}
{% set version = "0.5.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/phonoLAMMPS/phonoLAMMPS-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9b15861d4548e83ea8ae0a1198138e8c4b58e0e74bb64b61c10193082e37381c

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - pip
    - phonopy
    - numpy

test:
  imports:
    - phonolammps
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/abelcarreras/phonolammps
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'LAMMPS interface for phonon calculations using phonopy'

  description: |
    Calculate the 2nd order force constants using phonopy and LAMMPS.
  doc_url: https://phonolammps.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/abelcarreras/phonolammps

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
